name: Black Forest
description: Kirsch flavoured chocolate sponge layered with whipped cream and maraschino cherries and covered with chocolate shavings.

name: White Forest
description: Vanilla sponge layered with white chocolate ganache and frosted with cherries and white chocolate cigars.

name: Hawaiian Delight
description: Pineapple flavoured sponge layered with double whipped cream and chunks of pineapple.

name: Mocha Gateau
description: Mocha flavoured genoise sponge layered and frosted with rich coffee buttercream and decorated with toasted almond flakes.

name: Coffee & Walnut Gateau
description: Coffee flavoured cake layered and frosted with espresso-infused buttercream icing and decorated with walnut halves.

name: Dark Chocolate Passion
description: A delicious chocolate cake that is rich, moist and incredibly decadent. Chocolate lovers dream.

name: Chocolate & Hazelnut
description: Cognac flavoured chocolate & hazelnut sponge layered and frosted with hazelnut butter.

name: Mandarin
description: Orange flavoured sponge filled & frosted with mandarin cream and decorated with toasted nuts.

name: Seasonal Fresh Fruit Gateau
description: Vanilla sponge filled with double whipped vanilla cream and your choice of seasonal fresh fruit.

name: Forest Fruit Cake
description: Genoise sponge layered with berry mousse and topped with fruits of the forest.

name: Double Chocolate Mousse
description: Dark chocolate genoise sponge layered with dark & white chocolate mousse and covered with chocolate genache.

name: Strawberry Mousse
description: Light, tender and fluffy strawberry flavour mousse set on a vanilla sponge base. Decorated with fresh strawberries and layer of jelly.

name: Chocolate Mousse
description: A luscious chocolate mousse on a rich chocolate sponge. It is exceedingly rich and very chocolatey.

name: Alphonso Mousse
description: Mango lovers favourite!!! A creamy and fruity mousse cake packed with mango flavour.

name: Mousse Au Citron
description: Rich, silky mousse brightened with tangy lemons set on a lemon flavoured sponge.

name: Mint Chocolate Mousse
description: An incredibly rich and creamy chocolate mousse cake with the refreshing taste of mint...will spoil your sweet tooth!!!

name: Banana & Nougatine Mousse
description: Luscious yet light and fluffy mousse naturally sweetened with banana and a hint of naugatine.

name: Butterscotch Mousse
description: A light, fluffy, melt-in-the-mouth mousse cake with the heavenly flavour of butterscotch and crunchy caramelised almonds.

name: Trio of Chocolate Mousse
description: Triple chocolate mousse. A treat for chocolate lovers!!! A trio of milk, dark & white chocolate combined in a delectable mousse cake.

name: Cappuccino Truffle Mousse
description: Light and rich, sweet and creamy coffee flavoured mousse topped with coffee infused chocolate truffles.

name: Mousse De Maracuya
description: A delicious tropical mousse made from passion fruit pulp on a crunchy biscuit base.
